page.description: Extracts html and JSON formatted exif data from an iPhone photo.

argument.name: Result
argument.description: A dot variable holding the Lat, Lon, photo parameters and other properties

argument.name: fileName
argument.description: The filename of an iPhone photo. Character

item.name: C results
item.description: A dot variable holding all found properties

item.name: C json
item.description: All found properties formatted for JavaScript

section.title: Examples
section.example: dim formatted_exif as p formatted_exif = a5_exif_getIphoneFormattedData("c:\images\photo.jpg") ? formatted_exif
